answers.answer: Hello,This rash seems like an allergic reaction to levaquin. Also another possibility is stasis dermatitis which effects the lower limbs mostly. It is mostly from vascular problems in the lower limbs. Since you are having numbness of the hands, so I would suggest you to get evaluated for diabetes and any peripheral vascular disease which may cause such kind of symptoms. Please get your blood sugar levels evaluated and get an examination for any peripheral vascular disease from your physician. Also consult your doctor and get the medication changed from levequin to some other antibiotic.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your dermatologist. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.
